https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fy7ajB92MUB50uq9LhSrk3lEFoq.jpg 38 years after the events in the Luis Buñuel classic Belle du jour, Henri Husson thinks he sees Séverine one night at a concert. He follows her and makes her face her past and then takes a slow revenge on her. Belle Toujours
